title: November Cotton Flower - characterizes the poem

content.question: Which description best characterizes the poem?

choices.label: A recollection of a remarkable occurrence
A lament for a vanished way of life
An analysis of a momentous decision
An invitation to celebrate a hard-fought victory

content.answer: A recollection of a remarkable occurrence

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
